Write-Up Text: The people have spoken and it seems the upcoming federal budget for Australia has stirred up much buzz. Disability advocates were outraged by a Labor announcement for NDIS growth target while workers expressed concern over stagnating wages amidst the rising cost of living. The Health Minister's plan to regulate vaping was met with mixed reviews; some believe it may boost the black market while others laud the government's initiative. AGavrielatos' proposal of a National Energy Transition Authority was supported by various organizations. All eyes are on Albanese and Chalmers as they prepare their budget in hopes of saving the sinking Australian economy.
